experience: You and Cindy both know Om Mishra, Lonnie Barnes, and 2 others
You both worked at Charles Schwab
You both worked at Charles Schwab from Nov 2016 to Feb 2017

Fantastic Company!   I am providing 100% focused on end-to-end Release Management for web based financial software products using BMC Remedy change management software, identifying process improvements, defined and documented new release management processes, project tracking, strategic planning, governance, compliance, change control, status reporting and escalation, root cause analysis, auditing, and team coordinating in Agile work environment.
Elected to Anderson Mill Limited District, Vice President Board of Directors

I work with very talented staff and help in all ways that I can to make our park and pool district an affordable and wonderful place to live.  I plan and approve budgets, work with many vendors negotiating contracts, service level agreements, and managing our assets.  I do respect our citizens and will always keep their best interests in mind when making decisions.   Thank you for your support and let's keep our vision going forward.    Keep them swimming!

Contracted to provide 100% end-to-end Release and deployment management for web based financial software.-  98% success rate for production releases that increased company revenue in Agile environment. -  Designed and documented release processes, process improvements, while applying skills: strategic planning, governance, compliance, change control, root cause analysis, auditing, team coordinating; BMC Remedy software.    -  Hired full time by client, Charles Schwab, Inc.
Project/ Release Management, Lead Quality Assurance Engineer
Seeking New Opportunity | Release Management | ITIL

-Lead Quality Assurance engineer:  Tested Enterprise software, designed and executed tests, reported defects in BMC Remedy software, helped determine quality assessment of the release while also managing concurrent release cycles.   -Did project release management for the multiple release projects small and large(1-5) at any one time: resource, release cycle, shipment planning.   Practiced Agile development and ever changing environment, design, produce, review, incremental development, and revised features project when needed to maintain successful releases.  Worked in small agile team.  Communicated and worked across many teams to coordinate the products shipping and releasing on time.    Direct contact with customers, training, requirement gathering.    Herding/helping multiple teams to finish line.-99% Successful at shipping on time of 50+ large and small projects.   -Successfully developed and implemented effective/flexible change control process that was implemented Division wide and increased  quality in software.  -Developed, planned and executed 2 day Team building through Play event for new product development.   -Provided training to quality assurance testers and external customers.   -Presenter at Quality Assurance conferences.

recommendations: Lionel Dyck
President C323 Enterprises Inc. and z/OS Systems Programner
May 7, 2015, Cindy worked with Lionel in the same group

I had the privilege of working with Cindy at BMC Software for my limited time (13 months) there. She was very helpful from day one, providing me with help on getting to learn the ropes at BMC, including the official and unofficial processes and procedures. I found her to be very resourceful and knowledgeable in every aspect of the role. She is passionate about doing the job right, about caring for those who would be using the product that we were developing, and about communicating with everyone involved as appropriate. Her work ethic was such that I found her there when I got in (which was very early) and there when I left the office. She was always working to make the product better.Cindy, while not having formal project management training, did an excellent job managing the multiple projects (large and small) that our group was responsible for. She was actively learning project management skills and could have been an excellent full time project manager but she was invaluable as the Lead QA for our team which was a benefit for us.I would highly recommend Cindy for any role that she is interested in as I know that she will quickly pick up what she needs to be successful.

summary: I play to win!   •    IT professional that excels at Project/ Release Management and Quality Assurance  •    Excellent at Project/ Release Management and using organizational skills to help your company  achieve your strategic goals.   Successful at handling the management of multiple large and small projects to insure integration or succeed independently.   •    Thrive on supporting projects that will increase the revenue of your company and support your strategy.  Develop processes that are flexible, and evolve as needed.  Change, adjust and 'just do it'.   I succeed.•    Successful at QA planning, designing, executing, revising, maintaining tests to achieve repeatable successful deliveries.   Mentor, trainer, and do customer support.•    Skilled at QA, project/ release management, customer support and process improvement to make you successful.   Team builder!    Successful Skills:• QA - testing, building test cases, defect reporting; quality assessment, BMC Remedy, mentoring.• Organizing, schedule planning, forecasting, prioritizing, time management, analyzing project, SLA adherence, customer and company needs to meet goals.   Customer support.  Training• Coordinating, mentoring global cross-functional  teams using industry standards ITIL, CSQE, and Agile methodologies.   • Process Improvements –efficient, flexible, agile sustainable processes.   ITIL - Foundation and Service Strategy CertifiedProject Release Management  Quality Assurance  Process Improvement  BMC RemedyAgile Multitasking budget approval  SLAs service level agreement compliance Vendor contracting  Team building Team leadership Team player  BMC Remedy software Business software knowledge: MS: Outlook, Excel, Word, PowerPoint, Project.  Familiar with C+, SAS,  HTML, XML, and SQL languages.  SharePoint  IBM DB2 Enterprise software
